title: Mr. William Wheelers case from his own relation
author: Wheeler, William, 17th cent.
notes: Attributed to Henry Parker.  Cf. Wing and Halkett and Laing.
Also attributed to William Wheeler, Civil engineer.  Cf. BM.
MS. note by Thomason: "By Hen. Parker, Esquire."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
